name: open-parliament-romania
title: Open Parliament Romania Data
description: Legislative data from the Romanian Chamber of Deputies, including deputy information, proposals, interpellations, motions, and speeches collected from the official parliamentary website.

resources.name: deputy-speeches
resources.title: Deputy Speeches
resources.description: Parliamentary speeches and interventions made by each deputy during plenary sessions

resources.name: deputy-proposal-mappings
resources.title: Deputy Proposal Mappings
resources.description: Mapping of deputies to their legislative proposals, showing which proposals each deputy has initiated

resources.name: proposals
resources.title: Legislative Proposals
resources.description: All legislative proposals in the Chamber of Deputies, including proposal details, status, documents, and initiator information

resources.name: deputies
resources.title: Deputy List
resources.description: Complete list of deputies in the Romanian Chamber of Deputies with basic information including names, constituencies, and party affiliations

resources.name: deputy-details
resources.title: Full Deputies
resources.description: Detailed information for each deputy including full biography, committee memberships, contact information, and parliamentary activity

resources.name: deputy-motions
resources.title: Deputy Motions
resources.description: Simple motions submitted by deputies during parliamentary sessions

resources.name: deputy-interpellations
resources.title: Deputy Interpellations
resources.description: Interpellations submitted by each deputy to government ministers and officials
